question: How do I complete my daily health check?
answer: You are able to complete the health check by visiting the main page and clicking on the health check button. This will take you to the health check form.

question: How do I know if I'm clear to work?
answer: Once you complete the health check, you will receive a notification indicating whether you are clear to work or if further action is needed.

question: How can I view the latest policy updates?
answer: You can view the latest policy updates by going to the home page and viewing the latest updates section.

question: Will I get notified of new health alerts?
answer: Yes, you will receive notifications for new health alerts or updates relevant to your workplace.

question: How do I contact support if I need help?
answer: If you have any questions or issues, please fill out the contact form on the website, and our support team will get back to you as soon as possible.
